name: The Last Pumpkin
description:
It's the end of the world...and you're risking your life for a pumpkin.

This isn't just any pumpkin though - who knows what mystical powers it contains?
Infinite wisdom?
Time travel?
More pumpkins???

Maybe not - but it is abnormally large.

--------------------------------------------------

This game was made in under 48 hours as part of Kenney Jam 2022.




I've never done anything like this before, and towards the end it did get a bit rough, but here we are. The jam's theme was 'growth' and my original idea was to have you plant seeds to grow ammo and new weapons - although I only ended up having time for the pumpkin. Either way, it was a fun challenge and I hope you at least get a tiny bit out of it :)
